          local i = 0
          for _, entry in ipairs(Global.getVar("phaseCardNames")) do
               buttonIndex[entry] = i
               i = i + 1
          end

          local i = 14
          for _, entry in ipairs(Global.getVar("phaseCardNamesAdv2p")) do
               adv2pButtonIndex[entry] = i
               i = i + 1
          end
     end

     createButtons()

     refreshButtonHighlights()

     local players = {"Yellow", "Red", "Blue", "Green"}
     local hideFrom = {}
     for _, target in pairs(players) do
          if target ~= player then
               hideFrom[#hideFrom + 1] = target
          end
     end

     self.setInvisibleTo(hideFrom)
end

function createButtons()
     local tooltips = {
          "I: Explore (+5)",
          "I: Explore (+1,+1)",
          "II: Develop",
          "III: Settle",
          "IV: Consume ($)",
          "IV: Consume (2x)",
          "V: Produce"
     }

     local tooltips2pAdv = {
          "I: Explore (+5)",
          "I: Explore (+1,+1)",
          "II: Develop",
          "II: Develop",
          "III: Settle",
          "III: Settle",
          "IV: Consume ($)",
          "IV: Consume (2x)",
          "V: Produce"
     }

     local clickFunc = {
          "explore5Click",
          "explore11Click",
          "developClick",
          "settleClick",
          "consumeTradeClick",
          "consumex2Click",
          "produceClick"
     }

     local clickFunc2pAdv = {
          "explore5Click",
          "explore11Click",
          "developClick",
          "develop2Click",
          "settleClick",
          "settle2Click",
          "consumeTradeClick",
          "consumex2Click",
          "produceClick"
     }

     local startx = -5.73
     local startx2p = 7.63

     if prestigeSearch then
          tooltips = {"Prestige / Search"}
          tooltips2pAdv = tooltips
          clickFunc = {"prestigeSearchClick"}
          clickFunc2pAdv = clickFunc
          startx = 0
          startx2p = 0
     end

     for i=1, #tooltips do
          self.createButton({
               click_function = clickFunc[i],
               function_owner = self,
               width = 600,
               height = 600,
               position = {startx + (i-1) * 1.905, 0.11, 0},
               color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
               tooltip = tooltips[i]
          })
     end

     for i=1, #tooltips do
          self.createButton({
               click_function = "none",
               function_owner = self,
               width = 0,
               height = 0,
               font_size = 120,
               position = {startx + (i-1) * 1.905, 0.11, -0.1},
               rotation = {0, 0, 180},
               color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
               label = "",
               scale = {2,1,2},
               font_size = 1000,
               font_color = "Yellow"
          })
     end

     for i=1, #tooltips2pAdv do
          self.createButton({
               click_function = clickFunc2pAdv[i],
               function_owner = self,
               width = 600,
               height = 600,
               position = {startx2p - (i-1) * 1.895, 0, 0},
               rotation = {0, 0, 180},
               color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
               tooltip = tooltips2pAdv[i]
          })
     end

     -- these extra set of buttons are for highlighting selected actions
     for i=1, #tooltips2pAdv do
          self.createButton({
               click_function = "none",
               function_owner = self,
               width = 0,
               height = 0,
               font_size = 120,
               position = {startx2p - (i-1) * 1.895, 0, -0.1},
               rotation = {0, 0, 180},
               color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
               label = "",
               scale = {2,1,2},
               font_size = 1000,
               font_color = "Yellow"
          })
     end
end

function explore5Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Explore (+5)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function explore11Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Explore (+1,+1)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function developClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Develop"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function develop2Click()
     targetActionCardName = "DevelopAdv2p"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function settleClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Settle"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function settle2Click()
     targetActionCardName = "SettleAdv2p"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function consumeTradeClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Consume ($)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function consumex2Click()
     targetActionCardName = "Consume (x2)"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function produceClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Produce"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function prestigeSearchClick()
     targetActionCardName = "Prestige / Search"
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "selectPhaseCo")
end

function selectPhaseCo()
     if Global.getVar("gameStarted") == false or Global.getVar("currentPhaseIndex") ~= 0 then
          return 1
     end

     local adv2p = Global.getVar("advanced2p")
     local targetName = targetActionCardName

     if adv2p then
          -- Check to see if action was already selected. If so, just return it back to selection area
          if checkIfSelected(targetName) then
               returnSelectedActionCard(targetName)
               return 1
          end
     else
          returnSelectedActionCard()
     end

     wait(0.01)

     local sp = selectedActionCardTile.getSnapPoints()
     local rot = self.getRotation()
     local objs = actionZone.getObjects()
     local targetSnapIndex = 1

     if adv2p then
          local cardN = countSelectedActionCards()

          -- too many selected cards
          if cardN >= 2 then
               return 1
          elseif cardN == 1 then
               -- move the other card into the correct spot just in case
               for _, obj in pairs(selectedActionCardZone.getObjects()) do
                    if obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
                         obj.setPositionSmooth(selectedActionCardTile.positionToWorld(sp[2].position))
                         break
                    end
               end
          end

          targetSnapIndex = targetSnapIndex + 1 + cardN
     end

     for _, obj in pairs(objs) do
          if obj.type == "Card" and getName(obj) == targetName then
               local pos = selectedActionCardTile.positionToWorld(sp[targetSnapIndex].position)

               obj.setPosition({pos[1], pos[2] + 1, pos[3]})
               obj.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 180})
               return 1
          end
     end

     return 1
end

function returnSelectedActionCard(name)
     local objs = selectedActionCardZone.getObjects()

     for _, obj in pairs(objs) do
          if obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
               if not name or name == getName(obj) then
                    obj.setPosition(actionZone.getPosition())
                    obj.setRotationSmooth({obj.getRotation()[1],obj.getRotation()[2], 0})
                    if name then return end
               end
          end
     end
end

function placeCardAtSnapPoint(card, spOwner, sp, faceDown)
     local rot = spOwner.getRotation()

     for i=1, 3 do
          rot[i] = rot[i] + sp.rotation[i]
     end

     if faceDown then rot[3] = 180 end

     local pos = spOwner.positionToWorld(sp.position)
     card.setPositionSmooth({pos[1], pos[2] + 0.15, pos[3]})
     card.setRotationSmooth(rot)
end

function checkIfSelected(actionName)
     local adv2p = Global.getVar("advanced2p")

     for _, obj in pairs(selectedActionCardZone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.type == 'Card' and obj.hasTag("Action Card") and getName(obj) == actionName then
               return true
          end
     end

     return false
end

function getName(obj)
     return obj.getName() .. (obj.hasTag("Adv2p") and "Adv2p" or "")
end

function countSelectedActionCards()
     local n = 0

     for _, obj in pairs(selectedActionCardZone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
               n = n + 1
          end
     end

     return n
end

function onObjectEnterZone(zone, obj)
     if zone == selectedActionCardZone then
          refreshButtonHighlights()
          if obj.hasTag("PrestigeSearch") then
               uiSetVisibilityToPlayer("prestigeSearchMenu", player, true)
          end
     end
end

function onObjectLeaveZone(zone, obj)
     if zone == selectedActionCardZone then
          refreshButtonHighlights()
          if obj.hasTag("PrestigeSearch") then
               uiSetVisibilityToPlayer("prestigeSearchMenu", player, false)
          end
     end
end

function refreshButtonHighlights()
     local adv2p = Global.getVar("advanced2p")

     local startInd = btnIndexOffset
     local endInd = btnIndexOffset * 2 - 1

     if adv2p then
          startInd = btnIndexOffset * 2 + adv2pBtnIndexOffset
          endInd = (btnIndexOffset + adv2pBtnIndexOffset) * 2 - 1
     end

     if prestigeSearch then 
          startInd = 1
          endInd = 1
     end

     for i=startInd, endInd do
          self.editButton({
               index = i,
               color = color(0,0,0,0)
          })
     end

     for _, obj in pairs(selectedActionCardZone.getObjects()) do
          if obj.hasTag("Action Card") then
               local ind = adv2pButtonIndex[getName(obj)]

               if ind then
                    local name = getName(obj)
                    local index = adv2p and adv2pButtonIndex[name] + adv2pBtnIndexOffset or buttonIndex[name] + btnIndexOffset

                    if prestigeSearch and obj.hasTag("PrestigeSearch") then
                         index = 1
                    end

                    self.editButton({
                         index = index,
                         color = color(0,0,0,0.8)
                    })
               end
          end
     end
end
end)
__bundle_register("util", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
function magiclines(s)
    if s:sub(-1)~="\n" then s=s.."\n" end
    return s:gmatch("(.-)\n")
end

function all_trim(s)
    return s:gsub('%s+', '')
end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end

function shuffle(tbl)
    for i = #tbl, 2, -1 do
        local j = math.random(i)
        tbl[i], tbl[j] = tbl[j], tbl[i]
    end
    return tbl
end

function split(str, delimiter)
    local fields = {}

    local sep = delimiter or " "
    local pattern = string.format("([^%s]+)", delimiter)
    string.gsub(str, pattern, function(c) fields[#fields + 1] = c end)

    return fields
end

function tableLength(tbl)
    local count = 0
    for k, v in pairs(tbl) do count = count + 1 end
        return count
    end

    function getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
    local results = {}
    local players = getSeatedPlayers()

    for i=1, #players do
        if Player[players[i]].seated and Player[players[i]].getHandCount() > 0 then
            results[#results + 1] = players[i]
        end
    end
    return results
end

function add(v1, v2)
    return {v1[1] + v2[1], v1[2] + v2[2], v1[3] + v2[3]}
end

function getCardSlot(card)
    local hits = Physics.cast({
         origin = add(card.getPosition(), {0,1,0}),
         direction = {0,-1,0},
         max_distance = 5
    })

    for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
         if hit.hit_object.hasTag("Slot") then
              return hit.hit_object
         end
    end

    return nil
end

function getCard(slot)
    local hits = Physics.cast({
         origin = add(slot.getPosition(), {0,1,0}),
         direction = {0,-1,0},
         max_distance = 2
    })

    for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
         if hit.hit_object.type == 'Card' and hit.hit_object.is_face_down == false then
              return hit.hit_object
         end
    end

    return nil
end

function deleteLinkedListNode(list, value)
    local node = list

    while node and node.value do
        if node.value == value then   -- head of list
            list = {}
            break
        elseif node.next and node.next.value == value then
            node.next = nil
            break
        elseif not node.next then
            break
        end
        node = node.next
    end

    return list
end

function getLinkedListNode(list, value)
    local node = list

    while node do
        if node.value == value then
            return node
        end
        
        if not node.next then return nil end

        node = node.next
    end

    return nil
end

function concatPowerName(power)
    local value = power.name
    if power.name ~= "DISCARD" then return value end
    for code, _ in pairs(power.codes) do
        value = value .. "|" .. code
    end
    return value
end

function uiSetVisibilityToPlayer(id, playerColor, visible)
    local attr = UI.getAttribute(id, "visibility")
    if visible then
         attr = attr .. "|" .. playerColor
    else
         local newAttr = ""
         tokens = split(attr, "|")

         for i=1, #tokens do
              if tokens[i] ~= playerColor then
                   newAttr = newAttr .. tokens[i] .. "|"
              end
         end

         if newAttr == "" then
              attr = "Brown"
         else
              attr = newAttr:sub(1, newAttr:len() - 1)
         end
    end

    UI.setAttribute(id, "visibility", attr)
end
end)
return __bundle_require("Action Select Menu.74c6f0.lua")

-- Bundled by luabundle {"rootModuleName":"Setup Menu.6f9171.lua","version":"1.6.0"}
local __bundle_require, __bundle_loaded, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules = (function(superRequire)
	local loadingPlaceholder = {[{}] = true}

	local register
	local modules = {}

	local require
	local loaded = {}

	register = function(name, body)
		if not modules[name] then
			modules[name] = body
		end
	end

	require = function(name)
		local loadedModule = loaded[name]

		if loadedModule then
			if loadedModule == loadingPlaceholder then
				return nil
			end
		else
			if not modules[name] then
				if not superRequire then
					local identifier = type(name) == 'string' and '\"' .. name .. '\"' or tostring(name)
					error('Tried to require ' .. identifier .. ', but no such module has been registered')
				else
					return superRequire(name)
				end
			end

			loaded[name] = loadingPlaceholder
			loadedModule = modules[name](require, loaded, register, modules)
			loaded[name] = loadedModule
		end

		return loadedModule
	end

	return require, loaded, register, modules
end)(nil)
__bundle_register("Setup Menu.6f9171.lua", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
require("RftG/util")

vpPoolBag_GUID = "c2e459"
vpTokensBag_GUID = "5719f7"
tiedVpTokensBag_GUID = "d95c9e"
prestigeBag_GUID = "f3bcc8"
mainDeck_GUID = "b2cf34"
prestigeLeaderTile_GUID = "17753d"
expDeck_GUID = {"bfc713", "d7de72", "41c70b"}
drawMat_GUID = "021362"

vpPoolBagPlacement = {0.00, 1.40, 4.49}
vpTokensBagPlacement = {0.00, 500, 4.49}
tiedVpTokensBagPlacement = {-2.36, 1.46, 4.44}
prestigeBagPlacement = {2.36, 1.46, 4.44}
drawMatPlacement = {0.00, 1.48, 0.00}
mainDeckPlacement = {-1.75, 4.13, -0.02}
prestigeLeaderTilePlacement = {5.70, 1.58, 4.45}
advanced2p = false
useGoals = false
useTakeovers = false

firstGoals_GUID = {"862ecd", "0717b0", "4d4f32", "aa5bbd", "e62464", "7f50e3", "ef48af", "64829a", "e1d231", "37e57d", "f2932e", "e2b46b"}
mostGoals_GUID = {"417dc7", "c418bc", "2d8ccd", "61073b", "a9138d", "b0292b", "e64f18", "1c15bf"}
firstGoalsIndex = {8,10,12}
mostGoalsIndex = {6,7,8}

firstGoalsPlacement = {{-5.33, 1.48, 2.79},{-5.33, 1.48, 0.94},{-5.33, 1.48, -0.91},{-5.33, 1.48, -2.76}}
mostGoalsPlacement = {{5.69, 1.48, -1.01},{5.69, 1.48, 0.96}}

expansionLevel = 0

function onSave()
    local saved_data = {}
    saved_data.active = self.UI.getAttribute("menu", "active")
    return JSON.encode(saved_data)
end

--Loads save, creates buttons and identifies key entities
function onload(saved_data)
     if saved_data ~= "" then
          local data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
          self.UI.setAttribute("menu", "active", data.active)
     end

     self.interactable = false
     mainBag = getObjectFromGUID("4c1650")

     updatePlayerCountLabel()
end

function startGameClick(player, button, id)
     if button ~= "-1" then return end

     self.setPosition({0, -1, 0})
     self.UI.setAttribute("menu", "active", "false")
     startLuaCoroutine(self, "setupCo")

     --self.destruct()
end

function setupCo()
     local registeredColors = {"Yellow", "Red", "Blue", "Green"}
     local players = Global.call("getSeatedPlayersWithHands")
     local playerCount = math.max(2, #players)

     broadcastToAll("Setting up for a " .. playerCount .. " player game.", "White")

     -- removed unused objects by players
     local registeredPlayers = {}
     for _, player in pairs(players) do
          registeredPlayers[player] = 1
     end

     local unregisteredPlayers = {}
     for _, color in pairs(registeredColors) do
          if not registeredPlayers[color] then
               unregisteredPlayers[#unregisteredPlayers + 1] = color
          end
     end

     local playerData = Global.getVar("playerData")
     local readyTokens_GUID = Global.getVar("readyTokens_GUID")
     local smallReadyTokens_GUID = Global.getVar("smallReadyTokens_GUID")
     local statTracker_GUID = Global.getVar("statTracker_GUID")

     for _, player in pairs(unregisteredPlayers) do
          local i = playerData[player].index
          getObjectFromGUID(readyTokens_GUID[i]).destruct()
          getObjectFromGUID(smallReadyTokens_GUID[i]).destruct()
          getObjectFromGUID(statTracker_GUID[i]).destruct()
     end

     local drawMat = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = drawMat_GUID,
          position = drawMatPlacement,
          rotation = {0, 180, 0},
          smooth = false
     })
     drawMat.interactable = false
     drawMat.setLock(true)

     -- place vp bags
     local vpPoolBag = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = vpPoolBag_GUID,
          position = vpPoolBagPlacement,
          smooth = false
     })

     local vpTokensBag = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = vpTokensBag_GUID,
          position = vpTokensBagPlacement,
          smooth = false
     })

     vpPoolBag.setLock(true)
     vpTokensBag.setLock(true)

     local vpPoolBagPos = vpPoolBag.getPosition()
     for i=1, playerCount * 12 do
          vpPoolBag.putObject(vpTokensBag.takeObject())
     end

     if expansionLevel >= 3 then
          local prestigeBag = mainBag.takeObject({
               guid = prestigeBag_GUID,
               position = prestigeBagPlacement,
               smooth = false
          })
          prestigeBag.setLock(true)

          local tile = mainBag.takeObject({
               guid = prestigeLeaderTile_GUID,
               position = prestigeLeaderTilePlacement,
               smooth = false,
               rotation = {0, 180, 0}
          })
     end

     -- place Deck
     local deck = mainBag.takeObject({
          guid = mainDeck_GUID,
          position = mainDeckPlacement,
          rotation = {0, 180, 180},
          smooth = false
     })

     -- Remove gambling world because it is going to get replaced
     if expansionLevel >= 2 then
          for _, card in pairs(deck.getObjects()) do
               if card.name == "Gambling World" then
                    mainBag.putObject(deck.takeObject({guid = card.guid}))
                    break
               end
          end
     end

     -- check Expansions
     for i=1, expansionLevel do
          wait(0.1)
          deck.putObject(mainBag.takeObject({guid = expDeck_GUID[i], rotation={0, 180, 180}}))
     end

     -- check if using goals
     if useGoals and expansionLevel > 0 then
          local tiedVpBag = mainBag.takeObject({
               guid = tiedVpTokensBag_GUID,
               position = tiedVpTokensBagPlacement,
               smooth = false
          })
          tiedVpBag.setLock(true)

          local shuffledFirstGoals = {}
          local shuffledMostGoals = {}

          for i=1, firstGoalsIndex[expansionLevel] do
               shuffledFirstGoals[#shuffledFirstGoals + 1] = firstGoals_GUID[i]
          end
          
          for i=1, mostGoalsIndex[expansionLevel] do
               shuffledMostGoals[#shuffledMostGoals + 1] = mostGoals_GUID[i]
          end

          shuffle(shuffledFirstGoals)
          shuffle(shuffledMostGoals)

          for i=1, #mostGoalsPlacement do
               mainBag.takeObject({
                    guid = shuffledMostGoals[i],
                    position = mostGoalsPlacement[i],
                    rotation = {0, 90, 0},
                    smooth = false
               })
          end

          for i=1, #firstGoalsPlacement do
               mainBag.takeObject({
                    guid = shuffledFirstGoals[i],
                    position = firstGoalsPlacement[i],
                    rotation = {0, 270, 0},
                    smooth = false
               })
          end
     end

     wait(1)

     -- search deck for start worlds
     local card_db = Global.getVar("card_db")
     local startWorlds_GUID = {}
     for _, card in pairs(deck.getObjects()) do
          if card_db[card.name] == nil then
               print("'" .. card.name .. "' not found in card lookup table.", "Red")
          elseif card_db[card.name].flags["START"] then
               startWorlds_GUID[#startWorlds_GUID + 1] = card.guid
          end
     end

     startWorlds_GUID = Global.call("shuffle", startWorlds_GUID)

     -- for i=1, #players do
     --      local card = deck.takeObject({guid = startWorlds_GUID[i]})
     --      wait(0.1)
     --      card.deal(1, players[i])
     --      Global.call("attemptPlayCard", {card, players[i]})
     --      card.highlightOn("Yellow")
     --      card.addTag("Selected")
     -- end
     local redStartWorlds_GUID = {}
     local blueStartWorlds_GUID = {}

     for _, card in pairs(deck.getObjects()) do
          local data = card_db[card.name]
          if not data then
               print("'" .. card.name .. "' not found in card lookup table.", "Red")
          elseif data.flags["START"] then
               if data.flags["START_RED"] then
                    redStartWorlds_GUID[#redStartWorlds_GUID + 1] = card.guid
               elseif data.flags["START_BLUE"] then
                    blueStartWorlds_GUID[#blueStartWorlds_GUID + 1] = card.guid
               end
          end
     end

     redStartWorlds_GUID = shuffle(redStartWorlds_GUID)
     blueStartWorlds_GUID = shuffle(blueStartWorlds_GUID)
     
     for i=1, #players do
          local card = deck.takeObject({guid = redStartWorlds_GUID[i]})
          card.deal(1, players[i])
          card.highlightOn("Orange")
          card.addTag("Explore Highlight")

          card = deck.takeObject({guid = blueStartWorlds_GUID[i]})
          card.deal(1, players[i])
          card.highlightOn("Orange")
          card.addTag("Explore Highlight")
     end

     wait(0.1)

     deck.shuffle()

     for i=1, #players do
          deck.deal(6, players[i])
     end

     Global.call("gameStart", {advanced2p = advanced2p, takeovers = useTakeovers, expansionLevel = expansionLevel})

     return 1
end

function onPlayerChangeColor(player_color)
     updatePlayerCountLabel()
end

function updatePlayerCountLabel()
     local n = #getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
     self.UI.setValue("playerCount", "Players: " .. n)
     self.UI.setAttribute("advancedVariant", "interactable", n <= 2)

     if advanced2p and n > 2 then
          advanced2p = false
          self.UI.setAttribute("advancedVariant", "isOn", false)
     end
end

function advancedVariantClicked(player, value, id)
     self.UI.setAttribute(id, "isOn", value)
     advanced2p = (value == "True" and true) or false
end

function expClicked(player, value, id)
     self.UI.setAttribute(id, "isOn", value)
     if value == "True" then
          expansionLevel = tonumber(id:sub(id:len(), id:len()))
          
          self.UI.setAttribute("useGoals" , "interactable", expansionLevel > 0)
          if expansionLevel == 0 then
               useGoals = false
               self.UI.setAttribute("useGoals", "isOn", false)
          end

          self.UI.setAttribute("useTakeovers", "interactable", expansionLevel >= 2)
          if expansionLevel < 2 then
               useTakeovers = false
               self.UI.setAttribute("useTakeovers", "isOn", false)
          end
     end
end

function useGoalsClicked(player, value, id)
     self.UI.setAttribute(id, "isOn", value)
     useGoals = value == "True" and true or false
end

function useTakeoversClicked(player, value, id)
     self.UI.setAttribute(id, "isOn", value)
     useTakeovers = value == "True" and true or false
end
end)
__bundle_register("RftG/util", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
function magiclines(s)
    if s:sub(-1)~="\n" then s=s.."\n" end
    return s:gmatch("(.-)\n")
end

function all_trim(s)
    return s:gsub('%s+', '')
end

function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat
        coroutine.yield(0)
    until os.time() > start + time
end

function shuffle(tbl)
    for i = #tbl, 2, -1 do
        local j = math.random(i)
        tbl[i], tbl[j] = tbl[j], tbl[i]
    end
    return tbl
end

function split(str, delimiter)
    local fields = {}

    local sep = delimiter or " "
    local pattern = string.format("([^%s]+)", delimiter)
    string.gsub(str, pattern, function(c) fields[#fields + 1] = c end)

    return fields
end

function tableLength(tbl)
    local count = 0
    for k, v in pairs(tbl) do count = count + 1 end
        return count
    end

    function getSeatedPlayersWithHands()
    local results = {}
    local players = getSeatedPlayers()

    for i=1, #players do
        if Player[players[i]].seated and Player[players[i]].getHandCount() > 0 then
            results[#results + 1] = players[i]
        end
    end
    return results
end

function add(v1, v2)
    return {v1[1] + v2[1], v1[2] + v2[2], v1[3] + v2[3]}
end

function getCardSlot(card)
    local hits = Physics.cast({
         origin = add(card.getPosition(), {0,1,0}),
         direction = {0,-1,0},
         max_distance = 5
    })

    for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
         if hit.hit_object.hasTag("Slot") then
              return hit.hit_object
         end
    end

    return nil
end

function getCard(slot)
    local hits = Physics.cast({
         origin = add(slot.getPosition(), {0,1,0}),
         direction = {0,-1,0},
         max_distance = 2
    })

    for _, hit in pairs(hits) do
         if hit.hit_object.type == 'Card' and hit.hit_object.is_face_down == false then
              return hit.hit_object
         end
    end

    return nil
end

function deleteLinkedListNode(list, value)
    local node = list

    while node and node.value do
        if node.value == value then   -- head of list
            list = {}
            break
        elseif node.next and node.next.value == value then
            node.next = nil
            break
        elseif not node.next then
            break
        end
        node = node.next
    end

    return list
end

function getLinkedListNode(list, value)
    local node = list

    while node do
        if node.value == value then
            return node
        end
        
        if not node.next then return nil end

        node = node.next
    end

    return nil
end

function concatPowerName(power)
    local value = power.name
    if power.name ~= "DISCARD" then return value end
    for code, _ in pairs(power.codes) do
        value = value .. "|" .. code
    end
    return value
end

function uiSetVisibilityToPlayer(id, playerColor, visible)
    local attr = UI.getAttribute(id, "visibility")
    if visible then
         attr = attr .. "|" .. playerColor
    else
         local newAttr = ""
         tokens = split(attr, "|")

         for i=1, #tokens do
              if tokens[i] ~= playerColor then
                   newAttr = newAttr .. tokens[i] .. "|"
              end
         end

         if newAttr == "" then
              attr = "Brown"
         else
              attr = newAttr:sub(1, newAttr:len() - 1)
         end
    end

    UI.setAttribute(id, "visibility", attr)
end
end)
return __bundle_require("Setup Menu.6f9171.lua")

__bundle_register("RftG/readyButton", function(require, _LOADED, __bundle_register, __bundle_modules)
isReady = false

function onSave()
    local saved_data = {}
    saved_data.isReady = isReady
    return JSON.encode(saved_data)
end

function onload(saved_data)
     if saved_data ~= "" then
          local data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
          isReady = data.isReady
     end

     self.createButton({
          click_function = "toggleState",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 800,
          height = 800,
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
          tooltip = "Ready"
     })

     self.createButton({
          click_function = "toggleState",
          function_owner = self,
          width = 800,
          height = 800,
          rotation = {0, 0, 180},
          color = color(0, 0, 0, 0),
          tooltip = "Not Ready"
     })
end

function toggleState(obj, _, rightClick)
     if rightClick or Global.getVar("gameStarted") == false then
          return
     end

     isReady = not isReady
     Global.call("updateReadyButtons", {player, isReady, true})
end

function setToggleState(ready)
     local rot = self.getRotation()
     isReady = ready

     if isReady then
          self.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 0})
     else
          self.setRotation({rot[1], rot[2], 180})
     end
end
end)
return __bundle_require("Ready.dd182c.lua")

function createButtons()
    self.createButton({
         click_function = "none",
         function_owner = self,
         label = "0",
         width = 0,
         height = 0,
         position = {-0.82, 0.2, -0.4},
         font_size = 600,
         scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5},
    })

    self.createButton({
         click_function = "none",
         function_owner = self,
         label = "+0",
         width = 0,
         height = 0,
         position = {-0.72, 0.2, 0.5},
         font_size = 400,
         scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5},
         font_color = "Red"
    })

    self.createButton({
         click_function = "none",
         function_owner = self,
         label = "0",
         width = 0,
         height = 0,
         position = {0.5, 0.2, 0.02},
         font_size = 1000,
         scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5},
         font_color = color(1,1,1)
    })
end

function updateLabel(params)
    if not self.getButtons() then
         return
    end

    type = params[1]
    value = params[2]

    if type == "hand" then
         self.editButton({
              index = 0,
              label = value
         })
    elseif type == "military" then
         local prefix = "+"
         if value < 0 then
              prefix = ""
         end
         self.editButton({
              index = 1,
              label = prefix .. value
         })
    elseif type == "vp" then
         self.editButton({
              index = 2,
              label = value
         })
    end
end
end)
return __bundle_require("Stat Tracker.3b078d.lua")

               label = prefix .. value
          })
     elseif type == "vp" then
          self.editButton({
               index = 2,
               label = value
          })
     end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Notecard
ObjectStates.Description:
- Select action by clicking the menu buttons in your hidden zone. Click ready when done.

- Select cards to play by clicking the button on cards and paying their cost. They will be put into play after all players are ready.

- Pay the cost by flipping cards face down in your hand. They will be discarded after all players are ready.
